name: Driver Details
query:
SELECT
    `tabDriver History`.`driver` as `Driver:date:180`,
    `tabDriver History`.`vehicle` as `Vehicle:link:120`,
    `tabDriver History`.`approver` as `Approver:data:120`,
    `tabDriver History`.`start_date` as `Start Date:date:120`,
    `tabDriver History`.`end_date` as `End Date:date:120`,
    `tabDriver History`.`pickup_location` as `Pickup Location:data:120`,
    `tabDriver History`.`drop_location` as `Drop Location:data:120`,
    `tabDriver History`.`kilometer_distance` as `Kilometer Distance:data:120`
     
    
    
    FROM    
        `tabDriver History`
